attributes.additional_details: I feel that asthma can be a life threatening condition at times, and that asthmatics shouldn't suffer because they can't afford the inhalers they need and will never be free of the condition. I think they should be allowed free prescriptions so they can get inhalers as and when they need them and not suffer because they can't afford them.

rejection.details: Please see: Free Prescriptions for Asthma Sufferers
